bibl.title: Lycophron on Isis.
bibl.note: "My object in this note is to examine the implications of a passage in Lycophron's "Alexandra" [1291-1295] where an interesting difference from Plutarch's account [of the legend of Osiris, De Is. 12-20] appears to be presupposed."
bibl.seg: "My object in this note is to examine the implications of a passage in Lycophron's "Alexandra" [1291-1295] where an interesting difference from Plutarch's account [of the legend of Osiris, De Is. 12-20] appears to be presupposed."
